title: Story about a restaurant in HK this summer

replies.msg:
因真係太好睇，小弟忍唔住。P牌仔英文係咁上下，隨便更改，麻煩大家有機會可以分享去國外。

The menu was stated clearly
4 dishes & 1 soup
nothing less

Who knows manager Lam gave us none of them
Also called her employees to beat us
Beating us in the toilet
Pushing us on the floor
Somehow they started beating people sitting from the next table in the MTR
And forced some of my friends to commit suicide

Thus, we cannot give in
Turned the whole restaurant upside down
Scumbag, you took my money
And I am not getting what I pay for

We have no choice but to resist
Turned the whole restaurant upside down and again
This time asked with the help of the manager from the burger restaurant next door

By this time, they start to afraid
Manager Lam start giving out words
Saying that they are gonna serve us the soup
Four dishes with one soup
How come it is only soup left on the table?
and the soup is ice-cold

The funny thing is from my friends
Saying that "Well, at least our soup. Why not just sit down and start eating?"

So here we are
Shall we strive for our four dishes & one soup
Or we should just settle down with our soup?
Origin :麥美娟吊老母
